# bio_stocks

Displays a Stock's Company Info.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/bio_stocks ticker
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/bio_stocks AMD
```
